organizations: Host Roadshow in Rio Business Intelligence Vendor Yellowfin

thread.title: Business Intelligence Vendor Yellowfin to Host Roadshow in Rio
thread.title_full: Business Intelligence Vendor Yellowfin to Host Roadshow in Rio

title: Business Intelligence Vendor Yellowfin to Host Roadshow in Rio
text: Business Intelligence Vendor Yellowfin to Host Roadshow in Rio , 16 September 2015 -- Global Business Intelligence (BI) and analytics software vendor, Yellowfin, will be bringing its ‘Making BI Easy’ roadshow to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Tuesday 29th September 2015.Business Intelligence Vendor Yellowfin to Host Roadshow in RioGlobal Business Intelligence (BI) and analytics software vendor, Yellowfin, will be bringing its ‘Making BI Easy’ roadshow to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Tuesday 29th September 2015. Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, September 16, 2015 -- The breakfast event, delivered in collaboration with Yellowfin’s Brazilian distributor, Ajnet Tecnologia da Informacao Ltda (Yellowfin Brazil), will be held 8:30am – 12:00pm at Hotel Arena (Av. Atlântica, 2064 - Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro, Brasil). For further information, and to register to attend, GO HERE: http://www.yellowfinbi.com/YFCommunityNews-Yellowfin-s-making-BI-easy-tour-in-Brazil-you-re-invited-202044 Simone Clancy – Yellowfin General Manager for Latin America, who will be flying out from Yellowfin’s Australian headquarters for the event – said the roadshow would be an insightful networking opportunity.“Yellowfin’s ‘Making BI Easy’ roadshow in Rio will include an informative product demonstration and customer case study presentations, which outline how to solve modern reporting and analytics challenges with business-user-oriented BI technology,” said Clancy. “And, perhaps most importantly, it will provide a forum for Rio’s business analytics community, as well as Yellowfin’s Brazilian network of clients and partners, to share their expertise and experience.” Clancy said that attendees would: Enjoy an excellent information sharing and networking opportunity with fellow BI enthusiasts Learn from industry experts and Yellowfin use case presentation Network with members of Yellowfin’s senior management team Connect with local Yellowfin partners and users Experience Yellowfin first-hand via a live and interactive demonstration“Join in September’s fun and informative breakfast seminar to discover how Yellowfin is striking a fine balance between the self-service needs of business users and the governance requirements of IT,” said Clancy. “Not only will attendees enjoy a free breakfast in full view of Rio’s famous Copacabana Beach, they’ll also find out why Yellowfin is one of the quickest growing and most disruptive BI organizations in the industry. Discover why our customers rate Yellowfin as a global leader in product innovation, ease-of-use and support.” The RSVP deadline for the event is Tuesday 22nd September. For further details, contact: Attendees are encouraged to engage in the live Twitter conversation during the event under #YFinBrazil or @YellowfinBI. Yellowfin’s ‘Making BI Easy’ roadshow will tour Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Tuesday 29th September 2015. To register, GO HERE: http://www.yellowfinbi.com/YFCommunityNews-Yellowfin-s-making-BI-easy-tour-in-Brazil-you-re-invited-202044 About Yellowfin: Yellowfin is a global Business Intelligence (BI) and analytics software vendor passionate about making BI easy. Founded in 2003 in response to the complexity and costs associated with implementing and using traditional BI tools, Yellowfin is a highly intuitive 100 percent Web-based reporting and analytics solution. Yellowfin is a leader in mobile, collaborative and embedded BI as well as Location Intelligence and data visualization. Over 10,000 organizations, and more than one million end-users across 70 different countries, use Yellowfin every day. For more information, visit http://www.yellowfinbi.com For regular news and updates, follow Yellowfin on Twitter (@YellowfinBI), LinkedIn (Yellowfin Business Intelligence), YouTube (Yellowfin Team) or email to subscribe to Yellowfin’s free e-newsletter. For further media information, interviews, images or product demonstration, please contact: Lachlan James, Yellowfin Global Communications Manager on +61 (0)3 8617 4954, +61 (0)431 835 658 or Contact:
